patthana10.3:2.1: Hetuyā pannarasa, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate pannarasa.
patthana10.3:4.1: Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
patthana10.3:5.1: Nakusalaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naahetukañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nahetuvippayuttañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana10.3:6.1: Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
patthana10.3:7.1: Nakusalaṁ nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava.)
patthana10.3:8.1: Nakusalaṁ nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
